caption.title: The distribution of crude number of dengue cases (1A), estimated human population (1B) and crude incidence (1C) by province in Vietnam in 2001–2009.
caption.p: The lower panel gives crude number of cases (2A), estimated human population (2B) and crude incidence (2C) by province in 2010–2012. The observed dengue incidence given in 2C was used to validate the forecasting model developed in this study.
